text: In any prosecution under § 50-2203.01 or § 50-2203.02, whether the defendant was driving at an immoderate rate of speed shall not depend upon the rate of speed fixed by law for operating such vehicle.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 40-715.

1973 Ed., § 40-608.

DC CODE § 50-2203.03

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Motor and Non-Motor Vehicles and Traffic. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Immoderate speed not dependent on legal rate of speed.
